panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Used

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="exporter-node"}[$__rate_interval])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Usage
